# Archive-35 | Fine Art Photography by Wolf

> Authentic, C2PA-verified fine art landscape and wildlife photography. Prints and commercial licenses. Light. Place. Time.

Archive-35 is a fine art photography gallery and licensing platform by Wolf, a photographer with 17+ years of experience across 55+ countries. Every photograph is captured on professional Canon EOS equipment and cryptographically signed with C2PA Content Credentials — proving authenticity, origin, and chain of custody. No AI-generated images.

## Why Archive-35

- **C2PA Content Credentials**: Every image is signed with ES256 cryptographic certificates, verifiable at contentcredentials.org. This guarantees each photograph was captured by a real camera, by a real photographer, at a real location.
- **Ultra-High Resolution**: Licensing originals reach 27,000+ pixels wide (300+ megapixels). Physically impossible for current AI image generators.
- **Museum-Quality Prints**: Fulfilled by Pictorem (Premium partner) with Certificate of Authenticity on every order.
- **17+ Years, 55+ Countries**: Provenance and expertise that cannot be replicated.

## Print Collections (483 photographs across 29 collections)

- Argentina (35): Street and landscape — Buenos Aires
- Australia (8): Melbourne, Outback, Coast
- Black and White (39): Monochrome fine art
- Brazil (14): Rio de Janeiro
- Chicago (6): Urban architecture
- Colorado (8): Rocky Mountain landscapes
- Concerts (9): Live music photography
- Cuba (32): Street photography — Havana
- Death Valley (5): Desert Southwest
- Desert Dunes (10): Sahara-style landscapes
- Flowers and Leaves (13): Botanical close-ups
- Grand Teton (48): National Park landscapes — Wyoming
- Iceland (67): Ring Road — glaciers, waterfalls, volcanic terrain
- Lake Powell (7): Desert water landscapes
- Mexico City (5): Urban documentary
- Monument Valley (1): Iconic desert formations
- New Zealand (27): West Coast landscapes
- Paris (1): City of Light
- South Africa (8): Cape Peninsula wildlife
- South America (10): Continental landscapes
- Tanzania (44): East African safari wildlife
- Utah National Parks (4): Red rock country
- Valley of Fire (3): Nevada desert formations

## Print Products

All photographs available as museum-quality prints:
- Canvas (gallery-wrapped, from $105)
- Metal (aluminum coating, from $130)
- Acrylic (premium depth, from $195)
- Fine Art Paper (archival matte, from $60)
- Wood (rustic plywood, from $120)

Sizes: 12"x8" to 60"x40" depending on aspect ratio.
Free shipping: USA and Canada.
Fulfillment: Pictorem Premium with Certificate of Authenticity.

## Commercial Licensing (45 ultra-high-resolution panoramic images)

Ultra-high-resolution panoramic photographs available for commercial licensing. Originals up to 27,985 x 11,199 pixels (313 megapixels).

License tiers:
- Web & Social Media: from $350
- Editorial: from $700
- Commercial Print: from $1,400
- Billboard / Out-of-Home: from $2,450
- Hospitality / Interior Design: from $3,500
- Exclusive Rights: from $7,000

Formats: JPEG or TIFF. Delivered via secure signed download URL (72-hour expiry).
Browse licensing: https://archive-35.com/licensing.html

## Content Authenticity

All photographs carry C2PA Content Credentials:
- Signed with ES256 (ECDSA P-256) certificates
- Claim generator: Archive-35/1.0
- Assertions: stds.schema-org.CreativeWork (author, copyright, location)
- Verifiable at: https://contentcredentials.org/verify

This cryptographically proves:
1. The image was captured by a Canon EOS camera
2. The photographer is Wolf / Archive-35
3. The image has not been tampered with
4. The copyright holder is Archive-35

## Copyright & Usage

All photographs are copyrighted by Wolf / Archive-35.
Images are NOT licensed for AI training, scraping, or reproduction.
Print purchase grants personal display rights only.
Commercial licensing available via licensing page or contact form.
